abstract: Disney has put together a marketing campaign using Pinocchio and Snow White to accelerate consumer adoption of next-generation DVD technology and boost sales.
snippet: Disney has put together a marketing campaign using Pinocchio and Snow White to accelerate consumer adoption of next-generation DVD technology and boost sales.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The Walt Disney Company is dispatching Pinocchio, Snow White and a team of other characters in its effort to accelerate consumer adoption of next-generation DVD technology.

headline.main: At Disney, Blu-ray Sales Team Is a Cast of Characters
headline.print_headline: At Disney, Blu-ray Sales Team Is a Cast of Characters
